messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] from unschool grad -shyness
messages.msgSnippet: Karen: Sounds familiar! Anita ... to ... Homeschooling Mom Nottingham, PA There are many will claim to tell you what is due from you, but only one who can
messages.messageBody:
Karen:

Sounds familiar!

Anita


At 12:51 PM 4/18/2000 EDT, you wrote:
>Anita, I have noticed some of the same characteristics in my son; He has
to
>work out control issues at times. If children are over at our house, my son
>is not nearly shy as he is controlling. He wants to organize everyone, and
>tell them what to do! Karen
>
Homeschooling Mom
Nottingham, PA

"There are many will claim to tell you what is due from you, but only one
who can shear through the many, and reach the truth. And that is you, by
what light falls for you to show the way." Brother Cadfael in "The Devil's
Novice" by Ellis Peters.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] from unschool grad -shyness
messages.msgSnippet: Anita,  I have noticed some of the same characteristics in my son;  He has to work out control issues at times.  If children are over at our house, my son is
messages.messageBody:
Anita, I have noticed some of the same characteristics in my son; He has to
work out control issues at times. If children are over at our house, my son
is not nearly shy as he is controlling. He wants to organize everyone, and
tell them what to do! Karen
